name: LOCKEDOWN
description:
Play as noted action hero and gunslinger, John Locke, as you fight your way through generic enemies with no goal.

Source & releases at https://github.com/daatguy/lockedown.

LOCKEDOWN.pck works on anything running Godot.
The GNU/Linux/X11 build works on any system with X11 installed, e.g., GNU/Linux, *BSD
